timeline.message: Add mbi_hash column to attribution patients table
Add mbi_hash column to attribution patients table

timeline.bodyText: Do the hashes have a fixed length? If so, we might want to shrink this column a bit.
timeline.author: nickrobison-usds
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -422,4 +422,10 @@
                 columnName="gender"
                 defaultNullValue="3"/>
     </changeSet>
+
+    <changeSet id="add-mbi-hash" author="embh">
+        <addColumn tableName="PATIENTS">
+            <column name="mbi_hash" type="VARCHAR"/>

timeline.bodyText: Is there any portion of this that can be pulled out as class variables?
timeline.author: nickrobison-usds

timeline.bodyText: Do we have a failure case? Such as an empty or null string?
timeline.author: nickrobison-usds

timeline.bodyText: Is the comment saying that the source of this pepper is bluebutton?
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

timeline.bodyText: What happens if mbi is empty or null? The table's column can be null.
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS
